derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (denoting a pastoral poem): via Latin from Greek boukolikos, from boukolos 'herdsman', from bous 'ox'

entry.def: Bucolic means relating to the countryside.

means.word_mean: 2. a short descriptive poem of rural or pastoral life
2. relating to shepherds or herdsmen or devoted to raising sheep or cattle;
